title: Thomson Reuters shares rally after CoCounsel AI tool draws 1 million users
description: Thomson Reuters shares jumped more than 11% on Tuesday after the technology and content firm said its artificial intelligence-powered assistant for businesses, CoCounsel, has drawn one million users, easing fears of disruption by competing AI tools.
content: Feb 24 (Reuters) - Thomson Reuters shares jumped more than 11% on Tuesday after the technology and content firm said its artificial intelligence-powered assistant for businesses, CoCounsel, has drawn one million users, easing fears of disruption by c... [1641 chars]

title: Head of Amazon’s AGI lab is leaving the company
description: David Luan, the head of Amazon's artificial general intelligence lab, announced on Tuesday that he will be departing the company at the end of the week.
content:
The head of Amazon's artificial general intelligence lab is leaving the company less than two years after joining through a so-called acqui-hire deal of his startup Adept.
David Luan announced his departure Tuesday in a LinkedIn post, saying he will ... [1464 chars]

title: GoDaddy forecasts annual revenue below estimates on slow AI-related adoption
description: GoDaddy on Tuesday forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates, signaling that it anticipates slow adoption of its artificial‑intelligence tools and weaker customer acquisition across its core hosting business.
content:
Shares of the company fell nearly 8% in extended trading.

title: Stocks rise after getting a reminder of AI's potential upsides
description: The U.S. stock market rose after getting a reminder that the artificial-intelligence technology boom may also have an upside
content:
Stocks rose Tuesday after getting a reminder that the artificial-intelligence boom may also have an upside.
The S&P 500 climbed 0.8% and recovered nearly three-quarters of its sharp drop from the day before. The Dow Jones Industrial Average added 370... [3513 chars]

title: Bitwise CEO says AI Is ‘Unstoppable freight train’ for Crypto, Haun’s Monica urges caution
description: As artificial intelligence races ahead, some crypto executives believe it could become the force that finally pushes blockchain infrastructure into widespread use. Others aren’t convinced the leap is so straightforward.
content:

title: Top Chinese chipmakers plan to boost advanced chip output, Nikkei reports
description: China's top chipmakers, including SMIC , and Hua Hong Semiconductor , are aiming to boost their output of advanced semiconductors to meet burgeoning artificial intelligence demand, Nikkei said on Wednesday citing sources.
content: Semiconductor Manufacturing International Co (SMIC), Hua Hong and several Huawei-linked chipmakers are expanding or aiming to start production of chips with the most advanced technology available, including on the 7-nanometer (nm) or even 5-nm perfor... [393 chars]

title: Two Fed officials don't see major upheavel from artificial intelligence
description: Two Federal Reserve officials on Tuesday said they do not expect artificial intelligence technology to drive a massive upheaval in the economy.
content:
Feb 24 (Reuters) - Two Federal Reserve officials on Tuesday said they do not expect artificial intelligence technology to drive a massive upheaval in the economy.

title: Tech Stocks Propel Wall Street Amid AI Optimism
description: Wall Street saw gains with tech stocks leading the way, spurred by renewed interest in artificial intelligence. All major U.S. indexes increased, especially semiconductors. AI lab Anthropic's new plug-ins boosted specific stocks, while concerns over AI's potential disruptions persist across various sectors.
content: Wall Street ended Tuesday on a high note, with technology stocks taking the lead as fresh enthusiasm for artificial intelligence (AI) helped assuage fears of potential industry disruptions by the burgeoning technology. Recent weeks have seen volatile... [794 chars]
